sentences.english: As for whether he will visit the DPRK, I am not aware of such an arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 至於他是否去朝鮮，目前我沒有聽說有這方面的安排。

sentences.english: Shi Xing pain Chen interests, points out the consequences of the Japanese occupation of Korea will bring.
sentences.chinese: 石星痛陳利害，指出了日軍佔領朝鮮會帶來的惡果。

sentences.english: The Russian official assessed that Pyongyang was "hunkering down for a succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯官員認爲朝鮮會堅守繼承的傳統。

sentences.english: By late 1952, the Korean War had been going on for more than two years.
sentences.chinese: 到1952年年底，朝鮮戰爭已經持續了兩年多。

sentences.english: North Korea also prohibited reunions between North and South Korean families.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮作爲報復停止了讓朝鮮和韓國失散家庭團聚。

sentences.english: North Korea also prohibited reunions between North and South Korean families.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮作爲報復停止了讓朝鮮和韓國失散家庭團聚。

sentences.english: The North views Southern pamphleteering as hostile propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮認爲韓國的傳單爲惡意宣傳。

sentences.english: The leadership of North Korea could be a poisoned chalice.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮領導層有點像一隻被下毒的聖盃。

sentences.english: Cattle in North Korea being checked for signs of FMD.
sentences.chinese: 正在查看朝鮮的牛是否有口蹄疫症狀。

sentences.english: The additional troops quickly divided the North Korean forces, which had been stretched from north to south.
sentences.chinese: 增援部隊迅速分，被拉長了，從南到北朝鮮的力量。

sentences.english: An international investigation said a North Korean torpedo sank the ship.
sentences.chinese: 一項國際調查顯示朝鮮的魚雷炸沉了天安艦。

sentences.english: They have cooked and compared North and South Korean dishes.
sentences.chinese: 一起做菜，對比朝鮮和韓國菜。

sentences.english: But those hopes were dashed after North Korea was caught hiding its nuclear program.
sentences.chinese: 但在朝鮮被發現隱藏核計劃後，那些希望就化爲泡影。

sentences.english: Most Zainichi remove themselves from the North Korean regime as much as they can.
sentences.chinese: 大部分在日朝鮮人使自己離朝鮮政權越遠越好。

sentences.english: Most Zainichi remove themselves from the North Korean regime as much as they can.
sentences.chinese: 大部分在日朝鮮人使自己離朝鮮政權越遠越好。

sentences.english: He warned us about the serious situation of Byland Korea.
sentences.chinese: 他向我們談了朝鮮半島的嚴重形勢。

definition: South Korea (Republic of Korea)/Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄[zhan4 guo2 qi1 xiong2]/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
